TEXT.S: (Amis a ngangan:Ayal Komad; kowapin a sowal: ) I 1974 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 2 a romi'ad itini i Taywan Ilan siyen Soaw cen ko kahofocan ningra, o 'Amis Pangcah cingra, o misoritay to fangcalay a radiw cingra, nai 1993 miheca satapang a mikapot, adihayan to ko mitilidan milahecian ningra, ira ko ano maolah takowanan aka pilaliw; kowapin a sowal: pakonira; kowapin a sowal: o adada no ilol; kowapin a sowal: ira ho ko romaroma a nitilidan, mikapot aca cingra to ika. Itini to tona 2014 a miheca, pasadaken ningra koya fangcalay a radiw ci Ayal Komod kako; kowapin a sowal: , matama malemed cingra to saka 25 a cefang no fangcalay a radiw no kowapin. Tinako Kaemang ho ci Ayal Komod mikapot mikihatiy tonano kiwkay a romadiway, na satapang to a maolah to radiw, ya kocong ho cingra i, maolah mafana' a mitengateng, minanam to rowake (Ikiris a sowal: Rock Music; kowapin a sowal: )hananay, mirifet to romadiway a rifet, Misanga'an a radiw Natayalan Romadiway
